DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy 5-aminolevulinic acid subject type 2 diabetes medication .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient medication HbA1c ≤ 9.0 % ( JDS value , equivalent HbA1c ≤ 9.4 % NGSP value ) On stable treatment diabetes least last 3 month With permission attend clinical trial primary doctor On insulin therapy BMI ≤ 18 kg/m2 ≥ 30 kg/m2 History porphyria , hemochromatosis , viral hepatitis Pregnant nursing child Heart disease Renal hepatic dysfunction Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial
